American Idol's season-one co-host Brian Dunkleman admits to having been extremely freaked out the first time he saw Simon Cowell tell someone they should never sing again. It's one thing to watch it on television, but then you spend time with these kids and you have to look at them right in the eyes, and then their mother is looking at you, like, ''What just happened?'? The La Mesa Arnold Schwarzenegger Monday said his Senate Bill Lockyer 120 would force the state to accept registered warrants as payment for taxes or fees. IOUs could be a death knell for already struggling California businesses, Joel Anderson said in a statement. ''We need to completely rethink the minivan,'' CEO Sergio Marchionne said Tuesday at the Canadian plant where Chrysler's minivans are made. We need to retain all its functionality but make it much more versatile. Sergio Marchionne said that could mean new products that can still carry a lot of people but won't look like traditional minivans.
